page.description: Returns the type of source the table is - Native, ODBC , Native-Encrypted.
page.syntax: Type as C = Get_Source_type(C Filename[,L getLocation])
page.discussion: The TABLE.GET_SOURCE_TYPE() method returns the type of table referenced by DBF_Filename. Possible types are:

item.name: ODBC : ODBC table (i.e. the .dbf file is a link table that references an ODBC data source.

section.description: The "Native" type can be further qualified with these sub-types:

item.name: Shadowed : Table is a shadow to a different table. i.e. the table was created by a Network Optimize command.
Private : Table is encrypted with a private key.

section.description: Test the type of a shadow table.
Test the type of an ODBC table.
